case.title: Good beer on tap - 34 (Brooklyn)
case.text: Hello there! I am a fun and silly girl looking to have a few drinks and some laughs tonight. Alittle about me.. I am a SWF, 34, 5'4, brown hair and blue eyes. You should be cute, funny, and ready to make me laugh. Motorcycle riding, tattooed, animal lovers are a plus but not necessary. Your pic gets mine ;)
